text:
For example, there is a file located at http://localhost/masaru.html , If the
server is apache-1.3.27 with mod_negotiation, we can see it with the URL
http://localhost/masaru .

I found this problem is not exist in httpd_2.0.44. And I tried to backport a bit
of modify from httpd_2.0.44, it was success. Please apply following patch and
verify.

Regards.

--- src/modules/standard/mod_negotiation.c.orig 2002-03-14 06:05:34.000000000 +0900
+++ src/modules/standard/mod_negotiation.c      2003-01-23 12:54:59.000000000 +0900
@@ -994,7 +994,6 @@
 #else
                 if (strcmp(segstart, *cur_except) == 0) {
 #endif
-                    --nexcept;
                     ++cur_except;
                 }
creator: masaru@turbolinux.co.jp
slive@apache.org
text:
Unless I misunderstand what you are saying, this sounds like the expected
behaviour when Options Multiviews is enabled.
